clauFormulario.title: CLAU Form - Freelance Project
clauFormulario.description: Production form system for CLAU company
clauFormulario.longDescription: Freelance project in production used by CLAU company. Modern stack with ASP.NET Core 9 backend, React 18 + Vite frontend, containerized with Docker and CapRover ready. Integration with Brevo for email management.
clauFormulario.galleryDesc1: Instant confirmation sent to the client after submitting the form. Shows that their message was successfully received and provides a reference number. Transactional email sent via Brevo with custom HTML template.
clauFormulario.galleryDesc2: Notification email sent to the CLAU team with all contact data. Includes structured lead information, timestamp and option for Google Sheets integration for automatic lead tracking.

menuDigital.title: VOR-MENU - Digital Menu PWA
menuDigital.description: Progressive Web App for restaurant menus
menuDigital.longDescription: Modern PWA for digital menu visualization with product management, categories and real-time availability. Includes complete admin panel with authentication, CRUD for categories and products, and bilingual support.
menuDigital.galleryDesc1: Light theme of the digital menu, perfect for well-lit environments. Clean and professional design with excellent contrast that makes product names and prices easy to read. Ideal for daytime use or well-lit restaurants.
menuDigital.galleryDesc2: Dark theme of the digital menu, ideal for low-light environments. Reduces eye strain in low-light conditions, perfect for bars or restaurants with dim ambiance. Colors automatically adjust while maintaining readability and elegant design.

formularioVorluno.title: Vorluno Contact Form
formularioVorluno.longDescription: Enterprise-grade contact form with React frontend and ASP.NET Core backend. Optimized for CapRover deployment with Docker, includes email notifications via Brevo and optional Google Sheets integration.
formularioVorluno.galleryDesc1: Automatic confirmation email sent to the user after completing the form. Includes unique reference number and confirmation that their message was received. Custom HTML template sent via Brevo with brand-consistent design.
formularioVorluno.galleryDesc2: Notification email sent to the administrator with complete contact information. Includes all structured form data, timestamp and metadata. Optionally integrates with Google Sheets for automatic tracking of all leads.

sistemaPlanilla.title: Vorluno Planilla - Payroll System
sistemaPlanilla.longDescription: Complete payroll management system with clean architecture, payment processing, reports and employee administration. Implements CQRS and Clean Architecture for maximum maintainability.
